original_text:
“I will take up weeping and wailing for the mountains,
    and a lamentation for the pastures of the wilderness,
because they are laid waste so that no one passes through,
    and the lowing of cattle is not heard;
both the birds of the air and the beasts
    have fled and are gone.
korean_text: 내가 산들을 위하여 울며 부르짖으며 광야 목장을 위하여 슬퍼하나니 이는 그것들이 불에 탔으므로 지나는 자가 없으며 거기서 가축의 소리가 들리지 아니하며 공중의 새도 짐승도 다 도망하여 없어졌음이라

sentences.original_text: I will take up weeping and wailing for the mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 산들을 위해 슬피 울고 애곡하겠다

sentences.original_text: and a lamentation for the pastures of the wilderness
so that no one passes through
and the lowing of cattle is not heard
both the birds of the air and the beasts
